column4: my windows computer's battery died today and i was stuck with a computer that only had linux and i couldn't even do simple thing like use vncviewer
Darwin4Ever why is it so hard to use vncviewer in ubuntu
darwinsurvivor where do i download the vncviewer.exe
most any vnc viewer should work with any vncclient. for windows i tend to use Ultravnc, or tigervnc
